text: @Yamiche Dr Fauci saying COVID-19 is "very very low risk to the US" 2 days after Wang, Horby, Hayden and Gao warned of "human to human transmission," "risk of a much wider spread," "time to act is now" and "global health concern" is like a doctor ignoring a cancer and it then metastasizes
